about_the_game:
Step into the strategic chaos of Rogue Battalion, a unique World War II-inspired auto-battler that blends tactical decision-making with explosive battlefield action. Take command of a growing battalion as you face relentless waves of enemy forces, deploying troops and leveraging powerful abilities to turn the tide of war in your favor.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Auto-Battle Gameplay
    Watch your troops engage in intense, automated skirmishes while you focus on high-level strategy. Choose your units wisely, adapt your approach, and claim victory!

  • Call the Shots with Special Abilities
    Turn the tide with powerful support abilities! Call in devastating artillery strikes, summon life-saving air drops, or deploy reinforcements at critical moments.

  • Evolving Squad Customization
    Between waves, choose from a randomized selection of troops to grow your forces. Will you reinforce your front line, add a sniper for long-range support, or field an anti-tank unit to counter enemy armor?                      

  • Upgrade Your Arsenal
    Spend earned Supplies on upgrades during each run. Enhance your troops, improve support abilities, and experiment with different strategies to overcome tougher challenges.

  • Meta Progression for Long-Term Strategy
    Earn unlocks between runs to bolster your starting forces with small, stackable boosts that apply across all games. Each run brings you closer to ultimate victory!

  • World War II Atmosphere
    Immerse yourself in the gritty environments and iconic weaponry of World War II, all brought to life with a distinct art style.

  • Sandbox Mode
    Have fun with custom battles deploying as many troops as you'd like to in epic or completely pitched engagements.

How Long Can You Hold the Line?

Will you rise to the challenge and lead your battalion to victory, or will the relentless enemy waves crush your resolve? Rogue Battalion offers endless replayability with ever-evolving strategies and a satisfying mix of tactical combat and resource management.

Choose a commander. Build your army. Upgrade your forces. Form up your troops. Win the war!
